charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)  POSSESSION WITH THE INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to Count I of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 57 months followed by 2 years supervised release with special conditions and pay $100 special assessment

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1) POSSESSION WITH THE INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Indictment and Count II of the Superseding Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States.

charges.charge_description: 21:846 AND 18:2 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE 500 GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE OF METHAMPHETAMINE(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: The Indictment and Count II of the Superseding Indictment are dismissed on the motion of the United States.

Defendant pleaded guilty to Count II of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 70 months, followed by 2 years supervised release with special conditions, and pay $100 Special Assessment.

charges.charge_description: (Count 1) 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE 500 GRAMS OR MORE OF METHAMPHETAMINE (MIXTURE) (Count 2) 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1) DISTRIBUTION OF METHAMPHETAMINE (MIXTURE)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to count II of the Superseding Indictment and is sentenced to Probation for a term of five (5) years; $100.00 Special Assessment.

charges.charge_description: (Count 1) 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE 500 GRAMS OR MORE OF METHAMPHETAMINE (MIXTURE) (Count 2) 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1) DISTRIBUTION OF METHAMPHETAMINE (MIXTURE)
21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1) DISTRIBUTION OF A MIXTURE OF METHAMPHETAMINE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Information and is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of time served; 2 years of Supervised Release with Special Conditions; $100.00 Special Assessment.
Count II of the Superseding Indictment is dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only.

charges.charge_description: (Count 1) 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE 500 GRAMS OR MORE OF METHAMPHETAMINE (MIXTURE) (Count 2) 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1) DISTRIBUTION OF METHAMPHETAMINE (MIXTURE)
